keyword: how many calories in a small fry from mcdonalds
title: How Many Calories in a Small McDonald's Fry?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a small fry from McDonalds—about 230 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Small McDonald's Fry?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's small french fries serving (71g), cooked in vegetable oil blend, no added toppings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and oil type. Check McDonald's app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A small McDonald's fry contains about 230 calories with 29g carbs and 11g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Air-fried at home (similar portion, no oil)

faqs.q: How many calories in a small fry from McDonalds?
What are the carbs in McDonalds small fries?
faqs.a: About 29g total carbs, including 3g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: Are McDonalds small fries high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 11g total fat per small fry, with 1.5g saturated.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a small McDonalds fry?
Do small McDonalds fries have protein?
faqs.a: A modest 3g protein per small fry.
